arguments.explain: I need to open the app drawer to find the file manager app, so I will click the search bar at the bottom of the screen.
Click on the Chrome icon to open the file with Chrome browser.

arguments.summary: The task is complete. I have opened the file 'task.html' in Chrome, clicked the button five times, recorded the numbers (1, 2, 3, 4, 5), and calculated their product as 120.
